conversation.speaker: Alice
conversation.message: Hey Bob, how are you doing today?

conversation.speaker: Bob
conversation.message: Hi Alice, I'm doing well, thanks for asking! Just finished working on a project. What about you?

conversation.speaker: Alice
conversation.message: That's great! I'm doing alright, just catching up on some emails. What kind of project were you working on?

conversation.speaker: Bob
conversation.message: It was a website design project for a local bakery. It was a fun challenge!
